title: Teacher Intervention Workshop and Dialogic Discussion Design for Enhancing Metacognitive Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary metacognitive understanding and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Students/Job Seekers, Domain Expertise: Intermediate, Subject/Job Field: Language, Assessment Method: Project-Based Assessment, Technology Environment: Bring Your Own Device (BYOD).

learning_goals: Apply metacognitive strategies (planning, monitoring, evaluation) with at least 80% accuracy during problem-solving processes

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
